TopicTitle: Landed Vessel Node Not Working (1.4.2 MH) [SOLVED]

Articles.Content:
I am attempting to create a mission where landing on the Mun is required to progress, however the node for detecting a landing fails to trigger. The MechJeb and KerbalEngineer mods both say that the vessel is landed. 

Edit: Solved. See below.

Edited April 1, 2018 by prgmTrouble
I just remade the node and that seemed to solve the issue. This may have been caused by the 1.4.1 - 1.4.2 update.
